Pre-Game Insights: Imad Wasim said they won't take anything lightly and will play for the country and pride of their country.
Heinrich Malan said they've been lucky and will piggyback on their previous plans to execute well against Pakistan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan has been eliminated from the T20 World Cup after just 3 games, which is the first time in their history.
Ireland is yet to register a win in the tournament, having lost against India and Canada, and their match against the USA resulted in a washout.
The forecast for Sunday is expected to be better, but it all will come down to how much rain falls overnight and how the outfield will be in the morning.
Others: Pakistan will face Ireland in the last match of the Group A encounter on June 16 in Florida.
The 2 teams will look to salvage some pride after early exit from the T20 World Cup.
Pakistan and Ireland have been knocked out from the tournament.
The 2 teams had earlier met in a 3-match T20I series and Ireland did manage to take the Pakistan team by surprise.
